?config_version: please do not modify this element
?cross_bow_shot_explosion: determine whether a firework rocket shot by crossbow can explode
?hand_launch_explosion: determine whether firework rockets (except shot by crossbow) can explode
?base_explosion_power: determine the base power of the explosion (it would not work if the rocket was not made from firework stars)
?firework_star_multiplier: determine how much each firework star can add to the explosion power
?can_destroy_blocks: determine whether the explosion can destroy blocks
?tnt_mode: determine whether the explosion can keep all drop items like tnt (regardless of the game rule tntExplosionDropDecay)
?can_create_fire: determine whether the explosion can create fire
?show_particles1: determine whether the explosion have explosion particles
?show_particles2: for unknown reason, this did not work
